haraka mini marayi puththalama - nalin hendurugoda aanamaduwa sita puththalama bala yuwalak pamini yathuru padiyata puththalama nawika hamuda kandawura aasannayedi gawayaku wadimen yathuru padiye gamangath ek ayaku miyagos anek aya thuwala laba atha. 13 da sawasa margaye wal ali sitinawadayi wiparamin yathurupadiyen pamina athi mowun margaya mada siti gawayakuge ange wadi atha.
eya wasanthaye di ese nomathi wana, kalaya laba deda.
ada me bhikshuwa janadhipathithuma handunwanne thanathurak ho namin nowa “maha unda” lesatayi.
kuda awadhiye owun thula yahagunadharma athiwela nathinam wishayak thulin pamanak eya labadiya nohakiyi.
meka wenakota mata wayasa 15-16 withara athi.
thawath kaluwara wuna.
ihatha rathupatin dakwena kotase sinhala theruma ardhayo, purusha lingayo, mawath samaga sansargayata paminenna yannayi.
